com.github.dkanellis.fikey

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FiKeyAuth

    public interface Authenticator
    The Authenticator interface holds the main functionality of registering and logging in a user with the FIDO Universal Two Factor Authentication.

    To register a new user, the first part of the U2F registration is the username along with the password registration where they occur in the method (String, String) where the API user (a developer) can ensure that the password and username are of proper quality. For the second part (the device registration) the methods startDeviceRegistration(String) and finishDeviceRegistration(String, String) are to be used to properly register the FIDO device with the user.

    To authenticate a user, for the first part of the U2F authentication the method authenticateUser(String, String) is used to ensure that the user exists and that the password is correct. For the device authentication the methods startDeviceAuthentication(String) and finishDeviceAuthentication(String, String) are to be used to make sure that the device belongs to the user and has not been compromised.

    Author:
    Dimitris Kanellis
